item.title: Calling MCP Servers in C# with Microsoft.Extensions.AI
item.description: I posted recently about how to allow LLMs to call tools using the Microsoft.Extensions.AI NuGet package in C#. Obviously, a common usage scenario would be to expose MCP servers as tools for your LLM to call. Thankfully, the new ModelContextProtocol NuGet package makes this straightforward. Note: This package is still in pre-release (as is Microsoft.Extensions.AI), so do check the release notes for any breaking changes to the API. I've updated my demo application to support calling MCP tools, following the techniques demonstrated in Microsoft's Chat With Tools sample.
